alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Clearfield; Elk; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:40AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. A quick coating to 0.5 inch of snow accumulation will result in hazardous travel. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1235 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 26 miles northwest of Lock Haven to DuBois and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Williamsport, Lock Haven, DuBois, Clearfield, Jersey Shore, Sandy, Keating, Philipsburg, Woodland, Curwensville, Mill Hall, Avis, Penfield, Hyde, Dunnstown, Flemington, Renovo, Castanea, Osceola Mills and Plymptonville. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Dubois and Milesburg exits, specifically from mile markers 97 to 153. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
